message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it worthwhile for both of us. This is my counter-offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Time is running out, let's split it evenly and call it a day.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to split it evenly.
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, we both lose out if this keeps going.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not backing down.
